DianaViana

Full Stack Developer

BIO

Passionate and methodical learner. Autodidact. Technology lover. I push myself everyday to go out of my comfort zone to accomplish my goals so I can be relied on to help your company achieve its goals. Giving up is simply not part of my language. Creator of the Aurora Project which is about space and UFO related topics. Currently attending UT Coding Boot Camp to become a Full Stack Developer. Aiming to start as a front-end developer specialized in web design and work my way up.
